tool_description: API for showing the latest Climate Change News from around the world
name: Climate Change Live - Test
title: Climate Change Live - Test

api_list.name: Download CSV from any JSON returned on the news/:newspaperId
api_list.description: This endpoint will download all the result from the newspaperId

api_list.name: Download CSV from Google Search Image
api_list.description: This endpoint will turn your URL JSON into CSV, for more processing such as, automatic download or anything you want. Reload the page if the download fails

api_list.name: Search Image on Google
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to return the URL of any images that Google found on Google Image Search

api_list.name: Download CSV from the news JSON
api_list.description: This endpoint will turn you JSON data into csv, you can use it for your own good.  Reload the page if the download fails.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-test1.p.rapidapi.com/news/downloadcsv"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-test1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Single News
api_list.description: Get news about climate change from a specific newsletter
api_list.code:

url = "https://climate-change-live-test1.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {

        }
